mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.USERID, c.FACLTNM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like rl WHERE rl.REVIEW_IDX = r.REVIEW_IDX ) AS REVIEW_LIKE_COUNT FROM review r JOIN user_table u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX JOIN camping c ON r.CAMPING_IDX = c.CAMPING_IDX ORDER BY r.REVIEW_IDX DESC
mapper.insert: insert into review (user_idx, camping_idx, review_title, review_content, review_img) values (#{user_idx}, (select camping_idx from camping where facltnm = #{facltnm}), #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_img})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.USERID, c.FACLTNM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like rl WHERE rl.REVIEW_IDX = r.REVIEW_IDX ) AS REVIEW_LIKE_COUNT FROM review r JOIN user_table u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX JOIN camping c ON r.CAMPING_IDX = c.CAMPING_IDX WHERE r.review_idx = #{review_idx}

select R.*, U.userid, NVL(LIKE_COUNT, 0) as like_count from review R join user_table U on R.user_idx = U.user_idx left join ( select review_idx, count(*) as LIKE_COUNT from review_like RL group by review_idx ) RL on R.review_idx = RL.review_idx where R. like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by R.review_idx desc

select r.*, u.userid, NVL(LIKE_COUNT, 0) as like_count from review r join user_table u on r.user_idx = u.user_idx left join ( select review_idx, count(*) as like_count from review_like rl group by review_idx ) rl on r.review_idx = rl.review_idx where r.review_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by r.review_idx desc

select R.*, U.userid, NVL(LIKE_COUNT, 0) as like_count from review R join user_table U on R.user_idx = U.user_idx left join ( select review_idx, count(*) as LIKE_COUNT from review_like RL group by review_idx ) RL on R.review_idx = RL.review_idx where U.userid like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by R.review_idx desc
select review_img from review where review_idx = #{review_idx}
